issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
CloudFormation should not cause a stack trace to be logged when required services are unavailable:

fields.summary: CloudFormation should not log stack trace when required services not available

comments.body: [~sjones] What is the best way to verify this issue?

[~mmunn1], you could stop or deregister all simpleworkflow services.

EDIT: the issue was opened since this logging was seen on UFS hosts after a QA run so checking the cloud-error.log may be sufficient to verify.
No longer seeing this stacktrace having checked multiple recent QA runs.
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
